title: Jimi Hendrix - Hear My Music (2004) [FLAC]
description:
Hear My Music is a posthumous compilation album by Jimi Hendrix, released on November 30, 2004 by Dagger Records. The album contains rare instrumental studio jams and demos recorded in early 1969.


Jimi Hendrix - Hear My Music
Label: Dagger Records - CATF-05153-2
Format: CD, Album
Country: US
Released: 30 Nov 2004
Genre: Rock, Blues
Style: Blues Rock, Psychedelic Rock


Tracklist:

1 	Slow Version 	4:59
2 	Drone Blues 	8:31
3 	Ezy Ryder/Star Spangled Banner 	10:18
4 	Jimi/Jimmy Jam 	17:00
5 	Jam 292 	5:25
6 	Trash Man 	7:25
7 	Message To Love 	2:36
8 	Gypsy Blood 	1:24
9 	Valleys Of Neptune (Guitar) 	4:00
10 	Blues Jam At Olympic 	5:11
11 	Valleys Of Neptune (Piano) 	3:05
